questions: What does the error message "Cannot connect to host elasticsearch:9200 ssl:default \[Connection refused\]" indicate in ?
How to resolve the error message "Cannot connect to host elasticsearch:9200 ssl:default \[Connection refused\]" in ?
What does the error message "Cannot connect to host elasticsearch:9200 ssl:default \[Connection refused\]" suggest in ?
answer:
# What does the error message "Cannot connect to host elasticsearch:9200 ssl:default \[Connection refused\]" indicate in ?
The error message "Cannot connect to host elasticsearch:9200 ssl:default \[Connection refused\]" suggests that the
Elasticsearch server is not running or not accessible. This message is typically displayed when  starts before
Elasticsearch is ready.  will automatically resume when Elasticsearch becomes available.
